summary.para: Retrieves the composition timing information from the compositor.

param.name: processTime
param.para: The time, in milliseconds, when the compositor begins constructing the next frame.

param.name: compositionTime
param.para: The time, in milliseconds, when the compositor finishes composing and drawing the next frame on the screen.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The system implementation of IDirectManipulationFrameInfoProvider uses DirectComposition. is used to calculate the parameter values for GetNextFrameInfo.

summary.para: Represents a time-keeping object that measures the latency of the composition infrastructure used by the application and provides this data to Direct Manipulation.
